snippet: The United States on Thursday asked Ireland to hand over a man who the F.B.I. says is the world’s most prolific facilitator of child pornography.
abstract: United States asks Ireland to hand over Eric Marques, man who Federal Bureau of Investigation says is world’s most prolific facilitator of child pornography; Marques is accused of using encryption technology to offer an anonymous hosting service for Web sites with total of more than one million pornographic pictures.
lead_paragraph: The United States on Thursday asked Ireland to hand over a man who the F.B.I. says is the world’s most prolific facilitator of child pornography.

headline.main: Ireland: U.S. Seeks Extradition in Child Pornography Case
